languages.text: Несмотря на свой уход, Маражай так никогда и не расстался до конца с Вольным Торговцем, ибо их скрепили неуничтожимые узы, стоящие превыше обычных страстей. Нелюдя не раз и не два видели в реальном мире, бок о бок с Лорд-капитаном, что заставил{mf||а} неукротимого ксеноса признать мон-кай равн{mf|ым|ой} себе. О кровавых вакханалиях на борту флагмана династии слагали чудовищные легенды — как и о том, что враги фон Валанциус не раз и не два становились жертвами необъяснимых нападений тех, кто был в подчинении Эзирраеш.

Though he left, Marazhai never could fully part with the Rogue Trader, as their unbreakable bond went beyond simple passions. The inhuman was seen many times in realspace at the side of the Lord Captain, who had forced the indomitable Marazhai to recognise {mf|him|her} as an equal. Bloody orgies aboard the dynasty's flagship spawned bloodcurdling legends. There were also whispers of mysterious attacks on von Valancius enemies by Aezyrraesh's subordinates.
languages.original_text: Несмотря на свой уход, Маражай так никогда и не расстался до конца с Вольным Торговцем, ибо их скрепили неуничтожимые узы, стоящие превыше обычных страстей. Нелюдя не раз и не два видели в реальном мире, бок о бок с Лорд-капитаном, что заставил{mf||а} неукротимого ксеноса признать мон-кай равн{mf|ым|ой} себе. О кровавых вакханалиях на борту флагмана династии слагали чудовищные легенды — как и о том, что враги фон Валанциус не раз и не два становились жертвами необъяснимых нападений тех, кто был в подчинении Эзирраеш.

traits.locale_text: Even though he left, Marazhai never could part with the Rogue Trader for good, as their unbreakable bond was beyond simple passions. The xenos was seen many times in the realspace, alongside the Lord Captain, who made the indomitable creature recognize {mf|himself|herself} as an equal. Bloody orgies on the flagship of the dynasty spawned bloodcurling legends. People also whispered about the mysterious attacks of Aezyrraesh's dependants that befell the enemies of von Valancius.

Even though he left, Marazhai never could part with the Rogue Trader for good, as their unbreakable bond was beyond simple passions. The xenos was seen many times in the realspace, alongside the Lord Captain, who made the indomitable creature recognize {mf|himself|herself} as an equal. Bloody orgies on the flagship of the dynasty spawned bloodcurling legends. People also whispered about the mysterious attacks of Aezyrraesh's dependants that befell the enemies of von Valancius.

Though he left, Marazhai never could fully part with the Rogue Trader, as their unbreakable bond went beyond simple passions. The alien was seen many times in realspace at the Lord Captain's side, who made the indomitable xenos recognize {mf|him|her} as an equal. Bloody orgies aboard the dynasty's flagship spawned bloodcurdling legends. There were also whispers of mysterious attacks on von Valancius's enemies by Aezyrraesh's subordinates.

Though he left, Marazhai never could fully part with the Rogue Trader, as their unbreakable bond went beyond simple passions. The alien was seen many times in realspace at the Lord Captain's side, who made the indomitable xenos recognize {mf|him|her} as an equal. Bloody orgies aboard the dynasty's flagship spawned bloodcurdling legends. There were also whispers of mysterious attacks on von Valancius's enemies by Aezyrraesh's subordinates.

Though he left, Marazhai never could fully part with the Rogue Trader, as their unbreakable bond went beyond simple passions. The inhuman was seen many times in realspace at the side of the Lord Captain, who had forced the indomitable Marazhai to recognise {mf|him|her} as an equal. Bloody orgies aboard the dynasty's flagship spawned bloodcurdling legends. There were also whispers of mysterious attacks on von Valancius enemies by Aezyrraesh's subordinates.

Though he left, Marazhai never could fully part with the Rogue Trader, as their unbreakable bond went beyond simple passions. The inhuman was seen many times in realspace at the side of the Lord Captain, who had forced the indomitable Marazhai to recognise {mf|him|her} as an equal. Bloody orgies aboard the dynasty's flagship spawned bloodcurdling legends. There were also whispers of mysterious attacks on von Valancius enemies by Aezyrraesh's subordinates.

languages.text: 虽然玛拉斋离开了行商浪人的舰船，但是他从来没有完全离开过行商浪人，他们之间的牢固纽带已超越了简单的激情。玛拉斋多次来到真实世界，出现在领主舰长的身边。这只不屈不挠的异形已经把领主舰长视作与他平起平坐的存在。发生在王朝旗舰上的血腥狂欢催生了许多恐怖的传说，但也有传言说，艾泽拉什的部下会对冯·瓦兰修斯的敌人发起神秘的袭击。
languages.original_text: Though he left, Marazhai never could fully part with the Rogue Trader, as their unbreakable bond went beyond simple passions. The inhuman was seen many times in realspace at the side of the Lord Captain, who had forced the indomitable Marazhai to recognise {mf|him|her} as an equal. Bloody orgies aboard the dynasty's flagship spawned bloodcurdling legends. There were also whispers of mysterious attacks on von Valancius enemies by Aezyrraesh's subordinates.

traits.locale_text: 虽然玛拉斋离开了行商浪人的舰船，但是他从来没有完全离开过行商浪人，他们之间的牢固纽带已超越了简单的激情。玛拉斋多次来到真实世界，出现在领主舰长的身边。这只不屈不挠的异形已经把领主舰长视作与他平起平坐的存在。发生王朝旗舰上的血腥狂欢催生了许多恐怖的传说，但也有传言说，艾泽拉什的部下会对冯·瓦兰修斯的敌人发起神秘的袭击。

languages.text: Obwohl er fortging, konnte Marazhai sich nie völlig {mf|von dem Freihändler|von der Freihändlerin} lösen. Ihre unzertrennliche Bindung ging über bloße Leidenschaft hinaus. Der unbezwingbare Xenos wurde oft im Realraum an der Seite des Lord Captains gesehen und musste anerkennen, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} und er ebenbürtig waren. Blutige Orgien an Bord des Flaggschiffs der Dynastie brachten grauenhafte Legenden hervor. Es gab auch Gerüchte über mysteriöse Angriffe auf die Feinde der Valancius-Dynastie durch Aezyrraeshs Untergebene.
languages.original_text: Though he left, Marazhai never could fully part with the Rogue Trader, as their unbreakable bond went beyond simple passions. The inhuman was seen many times in realspace at the side of the Lord Captain, who had forced the indomitable Marazhai to recognise {mf|him|her} as an equal. Bloody orgies aboard the dynasty's flagship spawned bloodcurdling legends. There were also whispers of mysterious attacks on von Valancius enemies by Aezyrraesh's subordinates.

traits.locale_text: Obwohl er fortging, konnte Marazhai sich nie völlig {mf|von dem Freihändler|von der Freihändlerin} lösen. Ihre unzertrennliche Bindung ging über bloße Leidenschaft hinaus. Der unbezwingbare Xenos wurde oft im Realraum an der Seite des Lord Captains gesehen und musste anerkennen, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} und er ebenbürtig waren. Blutige Orgien an Bord des Flaggschiffs der Dynastie brachten grauenhafte Legenden hervor. Es gab auch Gerüchte über mysteriöse Angriffe auf die Feinde der Valancius-Dynastie durch Aezyrraeshs Untergebene.

languages.text: Même après son départ, Marazhai ne quitta jamais réellement {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, car leur lien indissoluble était plus fort qu'une simple passion. On voyait souvent le non-humain dans l'espace réel aux côtés {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, qui avait réussi à se faire reconnaître comme l'{mf|égal|égale} de l'irréductible xénos. Les orgies sanglantes qui avaient lieu à bord du vaisseau amiral de la dynastie furent à l'origine de terrifiantes légendes. Des rumeurs parlaient également de mystérieuses attaques menées par les subalternes d'Aezyrraesh contre les ennemies des von Valancius.
languages.original_text: Though he left, Marazhai never could fully part with the Rogue Trader, as their unbreakable bond went beyond simple passions. The inhuman was seen many times in realspace at the side of the Lord Captain, who had forced the indomitable Marazhai to recognise {mf|him|her} as an equal. Bloody orgies aboard the dynasty's flagship spawned bloodcurdling legends. There were also whispers of mysterious attacks on von Valancius enemies by Aezyrraesh's subordinates.

traits.locale_text: Même après son départ, Marazhai ne quitta jamais réellement {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, car leur lien indissoluble était plus fort qu’une simple passion. On voyait souvent le Drukhari dans l'espace réel aux côtés {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, qui avait réussi à se faire reconnaître comme l’{mf|égal|égale} de l’irréductible xénos. Les orgies sanglantes qui avaient lieu à bord du vaisseau amiral de la dynastie furent à l'origine de terrifiantes légendes. Des rumeurs parlaient également de mystérieuses attaques menées par les subalternes d'Aezyrraesh contre les ennemies des von Valancius.

languages.text: A pesar de su marcha, Marazhai nunca pudo abandonar por completo a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, ya que su vínculo irrompible iba más allá de la mera pasión. El inhumano se dejó ver en muchas ocasiones en el espacio real, junto a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, que logró que el indomable Marazhai l{mf|e|a} reconociera como un{mf||a} igual. Las sangrientas orgías que se celebraban a bordo de la nave insignia de la dinastía dieron lugar a leyendas espeluznantes. Además, se decía que los subordinados de Aezyrraesh atacaban casualmente a los enemigos de von Valancius.
languages.original_text: Though he left, Marazhai never could fully part with the Rogue Trader, as their unbreakable bond went beyond simple passions. The inhuman was seen many times in realspace at the side of the Lord Captain, who had forced the indomitable Marazhai to recognise {mf|him|her} as an equal. Bloody orgies aboard the dynasty's flagship spawned bloodcurdling legends. There were also whispers of mysterious attacks on von Valancius enemies by Aezyrraesh's subordinates.

traits.locale_text: A pesar de su marcha, Marazhai nunca pudo abandonar por completo a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, ya que su vínculo irrompible iba más allá de la mera pasión. El alienígena se dejó ver en muchas ocasiones en el espacio real, junto a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, que logró que el xenos indomable l{mf|e|a} reconociera como un{mf||a} igual. Las sangrientas orgías que se celebraban a bordo de la nave insignia de la dinastía dieron lugar a leyendas espeluznantes. Además, se decía que los subordinados de Aezyrraesh atacaban casualmente a los enemigos de von Valancius.

languages.text: 去りはしたものの、マラズハイは自由開拓者と完全に別れることはできなかった。二人の断ち切れない絆は単純な情熱を超えていたからだ。この異種族は、不屈のマラズハイに対等な存在であると認めさせたロード・キャプテンの側にいるところを、何度もリアルスペースで目撃されている。王朝の旗艦で行われた血みどろの乱交パーティーは、血なまぐさい伝説を生んだ。また、アエジレシュの部下がフォン・ヴァランシウスの敵を襲撃したという不思議な話もささやかれた。
languages.original_text: Though he left, Marazhai never could fully part with the Rogue Trader, as their unbreakable bond went beyond simple passions. The inhuman was seen many times in realspace at the side of the Lord Captain, who had forced the indomitable Marazhai to recognise {mf|him|her} as an equal. Bloody orgies aboard the dynasty's flagship spawned bloodcurdling legends. There were also whispers of mysterious attacks on von Valancius enemies by Aezyrraesh's subordinates.

traits.locale_text: 去りはしたものの、マラズハイは自由開拓者と完全に別れることはできなかった。二人の断ち切れない絆は単純な情熱を超えていたからだ。この異種族は、不屈のマラズハイに対等な存在であると認めさせたロード・キャプテンの側にいるところを、何度もリアルスペースで目撃されている。王朝の旗艦で行われた血みどろの乱交パーティーは、血なまぐさい伝説を生んだ。また、アエジレシュの部下がフォン・ヴァランシウスの敵を襲撃したという不思議な話もささやかれた。

languages.text: Marazhai, yanından ayrılmış olsa da Hür Tacir'den hiçbir zaman tamamen kopamadı. Aralarındaki sarsılmaz bağ, tutkudan çok daha güçlüydü. Lord Kaptan, boyun eğmez Marazhai'ın onu dengi olarak görmesini sağladı. İnsan dışı; sıklıkla gerçekuzayda, onun yanında görüldü. Hanedanlığın sancak gemisinde verilen kanlı seks partileri, insanların kanını donduran efsanelerin doğmasına sebep oldu. Aezyrraesh'in emrindekilerin, von Valancius'un düşmanlarına gizemli saldırılar düzenlediğine dair söylentiler bile yayıldı.
languages.original_text: Though he left, Marazhai never could fully part with the Rogue Trader, as their unbreakable bond went beyond simple passions. The inhuman was seen many times in realspace at the side of the Lord Captain, who had forced the indomitable Marazhai to recognise {mf|him|her} as an equal. Bloody orgies aboard the dynasty's flagship spawned bloodcurdling legends. There were also whispers of mysterious attacks on von Valancius enemies by Aezyrraesh's subordinates.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai, yanından ayrılmış olsa da Hür Tacir'den hiçbir zaman tamamen kopamadı. Aralarındaki kırılmaz bağ, sadece tutku olmanın çok daha ötesindeydi. Lord Kaptan, boyun eğmez Marazhai'ın onu dengi olarak görmesini sağladı ve insan dışı, sıklıkla gerçekuzayda, onun yanında görüldü. Hanedanlığın sancak gemisinde gerçekleşen kanlı seks partileri, insanların kanını donduran efsanelerin doğmasına sebep oldu. Aezyrraesh'in emrindekilerin, von Valancius'un düşmanlarına gizemli saldırılar düzenlediğine dair bile söylentiler vardı.
